import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { RouterOutlet, RouterModule } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule, RouterOutlet, RouterModule], template: `

Legacy Donation

Home About Donate Contact

Welcome to Legacy Donation

Making a difference, one donation at a time. Help us support families during their most difficult times.

Start Donating
Learn More
Facebook Twitter

© 2025 Legacy Donation. All rights reserved.

`, styles: [] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'Legacy Donation'; }
